summary:
I got sucked into the new Harry Potter game about a month ago.
 
Minus the energy biz and waiting for events (I'm not too...
caption:
I got sucked into the new Harry Potter game about a month ago.

Minus the energy biz and waiting for events (I’m not too concerned btw, I’m taking my time getting to Y3 since it’s not fully out yet), it’s actually pretty fun!

This is Hazel Fitzgerald, younger sister to Jacob and older sister to Johnathan. She loves dragons, flying class, and breaking school rules to find her stupid older brother in some vaults. Also Quidditch.

blog.description: *Mom* *Former band nerd* *Harry Potter lover* *Deadpool is life* #Dadlikesmarvelbutdaughterisnamedafter2DCcharacters

summary: I'm tired of being told that I am "too old" for Disney or Harry Potter. Do you get too old to be a car fanatic? Too old to be...
body: I’m tired of being told that I am “too old” for Disney or Harry Potter. Do you get too old to be a car fanatic? Too old to be into sports? Why are my obsessions considered things that have to be outgrown? Not to mention, have you watched Disney movies or read Harry Potter as an adult? Disney hides plenty of jokes and innuendos for adults (Just ask my fiancee, he didn’t believe me either), and personally, every time I read Harry Potter I gain new perspective based on what’s going on in my life. Life can be really fucking shitty at times, and we all need to escape at times. So next time you’re going to be something negative about something someone enjoys, think about this: does it really fucking matter that your 6'5 muscled out cousin can’t get enough of My Little Pony? Is it really going to wreck your day? As long as it isn’t hurting anyone else, just let people be happy.

Is it really going to wreck your day? As long as it isn’t hurting anyone else, just let people be happy.

Life can be really fucking shitty at times, and we all need to escape at times. So next time you’re going to be something negative about something someone enjoys, think about this: does it really fucking matter that your 6'5 muscled out cousin can’t get enough of My Little Pony? Is it really going to wreck your day? As long as it isn’t hurting anyone else, just let people be happy.

summary: Being a Ravenclaw is a blessing and a curse, we have superpowers (the ability to read a 300 page book in an hour or 2, the...
body: Being a Ravenclaw is a blessing and a curse, we have superpowers (the ability to read a 300 page book in an hour or 2, the ability to pick up any instrument and learn how to play it, etc) but we also have crippling weaknesses (the inability to people at time, a tendency to not want to shower, an addiction to video games or a book series)

Harry Potter Confessions collects confessions from fans around tumblr who have something they'd like to say. please read the RULES before clicking below.

we are accepting all confessions at this time

Ask Box is OPEN - - - Submitting is OPEN

summary: I think a lot of people would've done what Harry did in the forest, sacrificed themselves for everyone else. Not that that takes...
caption: I think a lot of people would’ve done what Harry did in the forest, sacrificed themselves for everyone else. Not that that takes from Harry’s choice and his bravery, but I don’t like it when people quantify bravery and say Harry’s ‘bravest’ because 'we don’t know what the others would do in his position’. I am absolutely certain that Ron, Hermione, Neville, Luna, Sirius, Snape, etc, etc would’ve done the same in his place.

reblog.comment: I think a lot of people would’ve done what Harry did in the forest, sacrificed themselves for everyone else. Not that that takes from Harry’s choice and his bravery, but I don’t like it when people quantify bravery and say Harry’s ‘bravest’ because 'we don’t know what the others would do in his position’. I am absolutely certain that Ron, Hermione, Neville, Luna, Sirius, Snape, etc, etc would’ve done the same in his place.

trail.content_raw: I think a lot of people would’ve done what Harry did in the forest, sacrificed themselves for everyone else. Not that that takes from Harry’s choice and his bravery, but I don’t like it when people quantify bravery and say Harry’s ‘bravest’ because 'we don’t know what the others would do in his position’. I am absolutely certain that Ron, Hermione, Neville, Luna, Sirius, Snape, etc, etc would’ve done the same in his place.

Not that that takes from Harry’s choice and his bravery, but I don’t like it when people quantify bravery and say Harry’s ‘bravest’ because 'we don’t know what the others would do in his position’. I am absolutely certain that Ron, Hermione, Neville, Luna, Sirius, Snape, etc, etc would’ve done the same in his place.

blog.name: poplitealqueen
blog.title: Live bravely in the time you have and smile at the void.

tags: I don't know what to tag this
summary: Just imagine how the world would be if it had been Harold "Harry" Potter. Imagine.
body: Just imagine how the world would be if it had been Harold “Harry” Potter. Imagine.

reblog.comment: Just imagine how the world would be if it had been Harold “Harry” Potter. Imagine.

trail.content_raw: Just imagine how the world would be if it had been Harold “Harry” Potter. Imagine.
trail.content: Just imagine how the world would be if it had been Harold “Harry” Potter. Imagine.

body:
Potion Class

We were in Professor Slughorn’s potion class and we were assigned to make the world’s strongest potion. I sat beside Harry and started preparing the ingredients that I will use.


Minutes passed by like a blur. I was holding a book on my left hand as I poured a small amount of powdered moonstone in the cauldron and gently stirred it when someone faked a cough and poked me from behind.


I turned my back and I saw a lad with a platinum hair. It was Draco. His brows were furrowed as he looked at me in the eye, “This horrible potion smells like you, Granger!” he exclaimed. Heads turned in our direction in an instant making me scowl. My eyes set sight at Professor Slughorn, he just placed his index finger on his lip, gesturing us to lower down our voices.


I looked at Draco and rolled my eyes, “Shut up, Malfoy, and focus on what you are doing,” my voice was filled with irritation as I gave him a glare. He went back to their table with a frown plastered in his face, still looking at me.


“Okay, everyone! Time’s up!” Professor Slughorn snapped. I looked at the cauldron once more before sitting beside Ron. He gave me a nod before laying his eyes in front.


Professor Slughorn stood up and walked towards the Slytherins. He stopped in front of Parkinson’s gang.


“Miss Parkinson, can you tell me what this potion is?” asked Professor Slughorn while pointing at the cauldron with a small smile.


“It is amortentia, professor.” said Pansy with a bored expression written all over her face.


Professor Slughorn’s smile widened, “Ten points to Slytherin! Now, can you tell me what is amortentia?”


I saw Pansy’s lips curved upward while looking at me, “Amortentia is the world’s strongest potion, sir. It is rumoured that it smells according to what a particular person is attacted to. And yes, Draco,” she gave him a smug look. “We heard your comment. Granger, huh?”

summary:
Harry: What do you think about James? I'd like our son to have my father's name
Draco:A wizard should have a name that says he's...
body:
Harry: What do you think about James? I'd like our son to have my father's name
Draco:A wizard should have a name that says he's a wizard. James is too muggle, too common. What about Scorpius?
Harry: I'm not naming my child Scorpius! Poor boy. What do you think of Albus?
Draco: Yeah, so I can tell my own son that he's named after a man I tried to kill, no thank you. Lucius?
Harry: No in a million years. Sirius? It's wizardish enough for you and it's the name of someone I love
Draco: You know what? I think our son can go without a name. Who needs a name after all?

dialogue.name: Harry
dialogue.label: Harry:
dialogue.phrase: What do you think about James? I'd like our son to have my father's name

dialogue.name: Draco

dialogue.phrase: No in a million years. Sirius? It's wizardish enough for you and it's the name of someone I love

dialogue.name: Draco
dialogue.label: Draco:
dialogue.phrase: You know what? I think our son can go without a name. Who needs a name after all?

blog.name: hi-pot-and-news
blog.title: "Wha'cha Writin', Sugar?"
blog.description: Writer; poet; general complainer • She/They (or He; it doesn't bother me) • CAUTION: I post mainly fandom-related things, primarily Harry Potter • My fanfiction | My tip jar • I repost poetry from my Instagram, @purpleprosodies • Commissions for fics and poetry are ever open • I post witch ish on my side-blog: Val The Sigilist

summary: Sometimes I think I'm a hella serious writer, like, just angst and realism and self-loathing, but then I remember I have a fic...
body: Sometimes I think I’m a hella serious writer, like, just angst and realism and self-loathing, but then I remember I have a fic filed as ‘Riddle Era AU with smol Tom Riddle after that booty and super-done Harry who just wants to eat his treacle tarts in peace’.

reblog.comment: Sometimes I think I’m a hella serious writer, like, just angst and realism and self-loathing, but then I remember I have a fic filed as ‘Riddle Era AU with smol Tom Riddle after that booty and super-done Harry who just wants to eat his treacle tarts in peace’.

trail.content_raw: Sometimes I think I’m a hella serious writer, like, just angst and realism and self-loathing, but then I remember I have a fic filed as ‘Riddle Era AU with smol Tom Riddle after that booty and super-done Harry who just wants to eat his treacle tarts in peace’.
trail.content: Sometimes I think I’m a hella serious writer, like, just angst and realism and self-loathing, but then I remember I have a fic filed as ‘Riddle Era AU with smol Tom Riddle after that booty and super-done Harry who just wants to eat his treacle tarts in peace’.

blog.name: kevinssecretplace4546
blog.title: Invisible lines
blog.description: HI! I'm Kevi. Pretty sure I'm Ace. I blog about Harry Potter, musicals, Team Starkid (as you might guess from my url), way too many tv-shows, as well as loads of random stuff

summary: I’m just here at the end of year 3 of Hogwarts Mystery doing random classes to get my courage, empathy and knowledge to level 20...
body:
I’m just here at the end of year 3 of Hogwarts Mystery doing random classes to get my courage, empathy and knowledge to level 20

I never thought I would bother with this game without the story

reblog.comment:
